results.title: Simvastatin attenuates vascular leak and inflammation in murine inflammatory lung injury.
results.journal: Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ attenuates @<m>DISEASE_Capillary_Leak_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019559 @@@vascular leak@@@ and @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ in @SPECIES_10090 @@@murine@@@ @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@inflammatory lung injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Jacobson JR, Barnard JW, Grigoryev DN, Ma SF, Tuder RM, Garcia JG. Simvastatin attenuates vascular leak and inflammation in murine inflammatory lung injury. Am J Physiol Lung Cell Mol Physiol. 2005 Jun;288(6):L1026-32. PMID: 15665042

results.title: Simvastatin attenuates radiation-induced murine lung injury and dysregulated lung gene expression.
results.journal: Am J Respir Cell Mol Biol
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@Simvastatin@@@ reduced multiple @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@RILI@@@ indices, including vascular @<m>DISEASE_Capillary_Leak_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D019559 @@@leak@@@, leukocyte infiltration, and histological evidence of oxidative stress, while reversing @DISEASE_Lung_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D055370 @@@RILI@@@-associated dysregulated gene expression, including @GENE_TRP53_PS @GENE_22060 @@@p53@@@, nuclear factor-erythroid-2-related factor, and @CHEMICAL_Sphingolipids @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013107 @@@sphingolipid@@@ metabolic pathway genes.

citations.NLM: Mathew B, Huang Y, Jacobson JR, Berdyshev E, Gerhold LM, Wang T, Moreno-Vinasco L, Lang G, Zhao Y, Chen CT, LaRiviere PJ, Mauceri H, Sammani S, Husain AN, Dudek SM, Natarajan V, Lussier YA, Weichselbaum RR, Garcia JG. Simvastatin attenuates radiation-induced murine lung injury and dysregulated lung gene expression. Am J Respir Cell Mol Biol. 2011 Mar;44(3):415-22. PMID: 20508068
